name: The Herd
description: '''The Herd''' were an [[Australian hip hop]] group formed in [[Sydney]] 2001. The group employs a "full band" format and is recognised for its live shows. The Herd is composed of Ozi Batla, [[Urthboy]], Berzerkatron (MCs), Unkle Ho (beats), [[Kenny Sabir|Traksewt]] (piano accordion, clarinet and beats), Sulo (beats and guitar), Toe-Fu (guitar), Rok Poshtya (bass) and singer Jane Tyrrell. The band's songs often feature politically oriented lyrics. The group has been largely inactive since 2013, reuniting for select performances.
